title: 2 Bedroom, ONE MONTH FREE!*Pleasant Apartments*
posting_body: ['***2 BEDROOM RENT SPECIAL: ONE MONTH FREE!', '*** CALL TODAY FOR MORE DETAILS', 'AVAILABLE NOW/AUGUST', '2 bedrooms, 1 bath, 750 square feet', 'Rent Starting @ $1,195/month', 'Pleasant Apartments offers 2 bedroom apartment homes for rent in Richfield, MN located on W. 65th and Pleasant Avenue.', 'It is within walking distance to many restaurants, shops, recreational opportunities, the bus line and much more.', 'Easy freeway access to downtown Minneapolis, Edina, Bloomington and Mall of America.', 'Call today and let our professional staff give you a personal tour of the community.', '**', 'show contact info', '**', 'Amenities:', '*Amazing professional staff that understands that service counts', '*Expert maintenance team with 24-hour emergency assistance available', Middle', 'High School', 'Richfield High', 'Bus Lines: 18, 4, 15', 'Number of Floors: 3', 'Parking: Off-Street Parking', 'Garages: None', 'Laundry:', 'On-site, First Floor- Coin Operated', 'Deposit starting at $500', 'Lease Terms: Month-to-Month rental agreement with a 12 month clause.', '$40 application fee per adult.', '$500 Deposit', 'Cats Accepted with the following restrictions:', 'Cats - $200 non-refundable pet fee, $15 monthly pet rent, a limit of 2 cats, and must be spayed/neutered.', 'Utilities: We pay for your heat, water, sewer, and trash pick-up.', 'Resident is responsible for electricity, cable, phone and internet.', "*Don't Wait ~ Prices and availability are subject to change at any time."]
